Pre-Game Insights: India have an edge over Ireland ahead of the clash and they will hope on beginning their campaign with a win.
Rohit Sharma and Co. are currently the top-ranked team in the ICC Men's T20 Team Rankings and are one of the favourite teams to lift the T20 World Cup 2024.
The Indian squad consists the balance of both experience and talent which will prove to be very essential for the side in the ongoing edition of the T20 Cup.
Ireland have the potential to give a tough time to India in their inaugural T20 World Cup 2024 match.
The key battles in the IND vs IRE T20 World Cup 2024 match will be between Indian batsman Virat Kohli and Irish spinner George Dockrell.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India National Cricket Team vs Ireland National Cricket Team ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 match will be played at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York on June 5, 2024.
The IND vs IRE T20 World Cup 2024 match will begin from 08:00 PM IST (Indian Standard Time).
Star Sports Network has the broadcasting rights of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 in India.
Disney Plus Hotstar has the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 online streaming rights in India.
